login-id_description: Sign in to continue to your account.
login-password_description: Sign in to continue to your account.
signup-id_description: Sign up to create your account.
signup-id_terms-and-conditions: By clicking the create account button, you confirm that you have reviewed and agree with the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
signup-id_terms-and-conditions-error: You must agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
signup-id_marketing-consent: I am interested in receiving information about products, services, events (workshops, webinars), and educational content. I consent to be contacted by phone or email.
signup-id_footerLinkText: Already have an account? Sign in
signup-password_description: Set your password to create your account.
title: We're unifying access through Danaher Login!
Description-1: To enhance your experience, please set a password for your Danaher account.
Description-2: You can log in directly with your username as an alternative to Dealer Single Sign-On, ensuring seamless access across all Danaher applications.
welcome_description_2: Welcome to Danaher Account! We're excited to help you reach your goals!
welcome_description_3:
If you are having any issues with your account, please don't hesitate to contact us by replying to this mail.
Thanks!
welcome_description_4: If you are not sure why you’re receiving this, please contact us through our Support Center.
verify_description_1:
Please use the following code to help verify your identity:
Your code is:
verify_description_2: For your security, do not share this code with anyone
verify_description_3: You're receiving this email because you have an account in one of our Danaher Lifesciences Companies. If you are not sure why you’re receiving this, please contact us through our Support Center.
reset_email_body_title: You have submitted a password change request!
reset_description_1:
If it was you, confirm the password change using this code
Your code is:
reset_description_2: If you are having any issues with your account, please don't hesitate to contact us by replying to this mail. Thanks!
reset_description_3: You're receiving this email because you have an account in one of our Danaher Lifesciences Companies. If you are not sure why you’re receiving this, please contact us through our Support Center.
mfa_description_2: You're receiving this email because you have an account in Danaher Account (Dev). If you are not sure why you’re receiving this, please contact us through our Support Center.
